description: This data is a set of objectively analyzed (1° grid) climatological fields of in situ salinity, derived from the WOA2005 at standard depth levels for annual, seasonal, and monthly compositing periods for the World Ocean. It also includes associated statistical fields of observed oceanographic profile data interpolated to standard depth levels on both 1° and 5° grids.
name: Cameroon AOI Salinity from World Ocean Atlas 2005
